entry.title: I'll Still Love You, in Every Universe.
entry.summary:
Author: H_buckleydiaz

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,342Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: 2024Buck is woken up by the sun coming through his windows. Something feels off, but he can't quite put his finger on it. It's probably just because he's tired.2030Everything over the last six years has worked out perfectly, so perfectly, and yet Buck still can't shake that weird feeling that has followed him for those six perfect years, but who cares? Everything is how it's meant to be.(or is it?)ORAn au based after 8X05 where Buck wakes up feeling weird, a familiar kind of weird, but he can't quite figure out why, even when he keeps feeling that weird, for a long and eventful six years, until it all falls into place and he realizes why that weird is so familiar.

entry.title: Collateral Damage
entry.summary:
Author: yoongiownsmywholeass

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,010Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 29

Summary: After Buck is abducted alongside Maddie and Jee Yun, the team faces a web of personal connections and old wounds that threaten to unravel them. As the clock ticks down, Eddie must confront his past mistakes and the unresolved guilt that’s been weighing on him, all while racing to rescue the people he loves. With tensions running high and the lines between family and duty becoming blurred, Eddie and Buck find themselves facing the harsh truth that their connection runs deeper than either of them realized — and the emotional fallout could destroy them both.

entry.title: Mission: Bring Chris Home
entry.summary:
Author: Taigger08

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,943Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 18

Summary: “Why?” Eddie voiced his question.Buck wasn’t prepared for that. He was prepared for anger at leaving the way he did, and appreciation for bringing his son home. He wasn’t prepared for Eddie to question his motive, and he wasn’t prepared to answer.“Eddie-” Buck started.“Why did you do all of that?”Buck quickly scrambled his mind for an answer that wasn’t ‘because I love you’ and ‘the thought of you leaving made me want to die’, his mind only supplying the other facts of the situation.-+-The best way to keep Eddie (the recently identified love of his life) from leaving him for Texas, is to bring Christopher back to L.A. Facing a few weeks off work following a brief kidnapping, Buck leaves for Texas without telling anyone. The mission? Bring Christopher home. Will Buck be successful?

entry.title: You don't find it, you make it!
entry.summary:
Author: Phoenix_parklife

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 512,774Chapters: 97/118Kudos: 729

Summary: After a troubling childhood growing up in London, England, 25-year-old Evan Buckley decided to move to LA and try and find his place in the world. Applying to become a firefighter, he enrolls in the LAFD fire academy before being assigned to station 118. As he works on building friendships with his co-workers, he also tries to find the family he’s always wanted and find the love of his life.As his secrets are discovered, and people from his past come back into his life, will he be able to find his family, or will he learn that family isn’t found… it’s made.

entry.title: You picked up the pieces (and turned them into a heart)
entry.summary:
Author: Mila_Enefee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,485Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 84

Summary: Evan almost admits to his mom that he is bisexual when Athena catches Michael cheating with a man and a huge scandal breaks out. Evan was never afraid that his mom wouldn't accept him, but now? Deep down, he understands that she will love him in any way, but every time he tries to confess, he panics. So Evan decides not to say anything.Things get complicated when he meets Tim Bradford, a police officer who works with his mom. However, they date for almost six months before Tim breaks his heart into pieces.Desperate and furious, Evan joins the army and meets Eddie Diaz there.Meanwhile, Daniel and Maddie Buckley live their lives until they find out something.

entry.title: The Ghost of You
entry.summary:
Author: bvddiesbro

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,031Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 112

Summary: Evan "Buck" Buckley thought he had left his past behind when he traded his Navy fatigues for turnouts. For years, he’s buried the memories—of war zones, of a lost lover, of the life he swore he'd never return to. But when a series of arson attacks target classified SCIF sites across Los Angeles, his past comes back to haunt him.NCIS are called to investigate and Buck’s carefully constructed web of lies begins to crack when Special Agent Sam Hanna arrives at Station 118—because Buck knows him. Sam was once his teammate, his mentor and his sudden reappearance is no coincidence.When a grainy surveillance video reveals a face Buck thought he’d never see again, the ground shifts beneath his feet. Zack, the man he mourned, the man he watched die, is alive.Working alongside NCIS and his old SEAL Team, Buck finds himself walking a dangerous tightrope. The deeper he gets, the more he risks everything—his job, his family, his friendships and the life he’s built with Eddie and Christopher.But secrets can’t stay buried forever.

entry.title: Those Two Words
entry.summary:
Author: bisexual_disaster_118

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,229Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 158

Summary: Eddie nods. “Yeah, yeah okay. We’re meeting at the park in half an hour so… so I’ll talk to him.”“He loves you, Eddie. He’ll come around.”“Thanks, man.”“Any time. Thanks again, love you,” Eddie finishes, and then the screen goes blank.------Or, the one where Eddie is in Texas and accidentally ends a call to Buck with “love you”, and these oblivious fools spiral trying to figure out what those two words mean.

entry.title: A fate worse than death
entry.summary:
Author: ogaabby557

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,892Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 40

Summary: Eddie was not freaking out. He was not freaking out and he was definitely not panicking. Eddie was not the kind of man who panics. Was he nervous as shit for today? Yeah. Was he gripping the steering wheel until his knuckles turned white? Maybe. But was he panicking? No. Definitely not. He was going to ask the love of his life to marry him today, and he was feeling completely fine about it.Okay maybe he was panicking OREddie is going to ask Buck to marry him but on the way to the restaurant they get into a car accident

entry.title: even with the lights off
entry.summary:
Author: lilacbarnes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,164Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 49

Summary: As they stumble through the bedroom door and the man pulls Buck on top of him, Buck’s too aware that this is Eddie’s bedroom. Eddie exists all over it, in the patchwork walls and at the foot of the bed, in the corner by the dresser, opening the window in the summertime. Instead, he welcomes the darkened room, relying on errant moonlight to highlight the outlines of the furniture, and nothing else.If he keeps the lights off it’s just a room. He can pretend it’s anywhere. This could be his old loft, or an illicit hotel rendezvous rather than the home he carved for himself in his best friend’s house like a desperate, abandoned animal.If he keeps the lights off, he can’t see Eddie in each corner of the room. Or, Buck tries to make friends, ends up sleeping with them, and may or may not see Eddie each time he does it.

entry.title: Morning after Confessions!
entry.summary:
Author: PheonixInk

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 769Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 97

Summary: Buck never meant for it to happen. One drink turned into two, laughter turned into lingering touches, and before he knew it, he was tangled up in Eddie Diaz’s sheets. Now, with the sun streaming through the blinds, panic sets in. But Eddie? Eddie doesn’t regret a damn thing.
